verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Intro:
We give you the highest praise
We give you the highest praise

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse: 1
Praise God in the sanctuary

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Praise God in the heavens above
Praise God for His way is mighty
O praise Him
Praise God for His endless mercy

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Praise God for His love endures
Praise God for His name is holy
O praise Him

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Let everything that has breath
Let everything that has breath
Let everything that has breath
Praise the Lord

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Verse: 2
Praise God for His awesome power

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Praise God, He has overcome
Praise God, He alone is worthy
O praise Him

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
We're pouring out
A life of praise before you now
